alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Highland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 3:59PM EDT until May 03 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Brown County in southwestern Ohio... Northwestern Adams County in southwestern Ohio... Highland County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 359 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mount Orab, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Greenfield, Mount Orab, Leesburg, Winchester, Marshall, Sardinia, Belfast, Rocky Fork Point, Highland Holiday, Russell, New Market, Emerald, Hamersville, Mowrystown, Sinking Spring, East Monroe, Danville in Highland County, Samantha and May Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and southwestern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and southwestern Ohio.
